mapper.select: SELECT A.* FROM EM_INSPECTION_MAIN A WHERE EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM EM_INSPECTION_ITEM B WHERE A.ID = B.INSPECTION_MAIN_ID) AND EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM EM_INSPECTION_SHIFT C WHERE A.ID = C.INSPECTION_MAIN_ID) ORDER BY A.ID, A.MCH_NAME, A.SPEC, A.TYPE_VERSION

SELECT A.ID, A.ORDER_NUMBER, A.MCH_CODE, A.INSPECTION_DATE, A.INSPECTION_SHIFT, A.SHIFT_START_TIME, A.SHIFT_END_TIME, A.DUTY_PERSON_ID, A.STATUS, A.CREATED_TIME, A.CREATED_BY, A.UPDATED_TIME, A.UPDATED_BY, B.MCH_NAME, B.SPEC, B.TYPE_VERSION, B.FACTORY_NO FROM EM_INSPECTION_ORDER A LEFT JOIN EM_EQUIPMENT B ON A.MCH_CODE = B.MCH_CODE ORDER BY A.ORDER_NUMBER
